::: card-body
##### WebR

[The statistical language R compiled into Wasm for use in a browser, via
Emscripten.]{.card-text}

<a href="https://github.com/r-wasm/webr/" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-github"></i> GitHub</a>
<a href="https://docs.r-wasm.org/webr/latest/" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-link"></i> Website</a>
:::
:::

::: p-2
:::

::: card
![](images/gc.png){fig-alt="A screenshot showing the Graph Curvature Calculator software."}

::: card-body
##### Graph Curvature Calculator

[A web tool for calculating curvature of graphs under various discrete curvature
notions.]{.card-text}

<a href="https://github.com/georgestagg/graph-curvature-webapp" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-github"></i> GitHub</a>
<a href="https://www.mas.ncl.ac.uk/graph-curvature/" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-link"></i> Website</a>
:::
:::
:::
:::

::: {.column-body-outset .mb-3}
::: card-group
::: card
![](images/2dgp.png){fig-alt="Visualisation of output from the 2D-GP software."}

::: card-body
##### 2D-GP

[A Fortran project that numerically solves the Gross-Pitaevskii Equation in 2D
using OpenMP.]{.card-text}

<a href="https://github.com/georgestagg/2D-GP" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-github"></i> GitHub</a>
:::
:::

::: p-2
:::

::: card
![](images/3dgp.png){fig-alt="Visualisation of output from the 3D-GP-MPIOMP software."}

::: card-body
##### 3D-GP-MPIOMP

[A Fortran project that numerically solves the Gross-Pitaevskii Equation in 3D
using MPI and OpenMP.]{.card-text}

<a href="https://github.com/georgestagg/3D-GP-MPIOMP" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-github"></i> GitHub</a>
:::
:::
:::
:::

::: card
![](images/dsp.png){fig-alt="A screenshot of output from the Double Spherical Pendulum demo."}

::: card-body
##### Double Spherical Pendulum

[Classical physics simulation of a double pendulum with spherical joints and masses otherwise free to move in 3D.]{.card-text}

<a href="https://github.com/georgestagg/pendulum" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-github"></i> GitHub</a>
<a href="http://georgestagg.github.io/pendulum/" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-link"></i> Website</a>
:::
:::

:::

::: card
![](images/webgl_gpe.png){fig-alt="Visualisation of output from the WebGL GPE."}

::: card-body
##### WebGL GPE

[A WebGL implementation of a 2D Gross-Pitaevskii Equation numerical solver. The solver runs in real time and is directly interactive.]{.card-text}

<a href="https://github.com/georgestagg/webgl_gpe" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-github"></i> GitHub</a>
<a href="http://georgestagg.github.io/webgl_gpe/" class="btn btn-primary"><i class="bi-link"></i> Website</a>
:::
:::
:::
:::
